values.value: Note: You must perform these steps in Classic. 1. Navigate to Setup > Build > Develop > Custom Settings. 2. Locate System Properties (nFORCE) and click Manage. 3. For each of the following system property values in the category Rule_Engine_Communicator, replace the characters through .com with your org URL. Ensure that you preserve the characters after .com: -- OAUTH2_AUTH_URL -- OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URL -- OAUTH2_TOKEN_URL 4. In the category Rule_Engine_Communicator, set the following system property values: -- OAUTH2_AUTH_CODE: (blank) -- OAUTH2_REFRESH_CODE: (blank) -- OAUTH2_CONSUMER_KEY: Set to the Consumer Key in the Portal_OAuth66 Connected App 5. For each of the following system property values in the category OCR_Communicator, replace the characters through .com with your org URL. Ensure that you preserve the characters after .com: -- OCR_OAUTH2_AUTH_URL -- OCR_OAUTH2_TOKEN_URL -- OCR_OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URL
